name: WordCamp-Minneapolis-2018-automating-QA-with-visual-regression-testing
description: This repository is an example for my talk "Automating your QA with Visual Regression Testing" at WordCamp Minneapolis 2018.

scripts.build: rimraf dist/ && rimraf backstop_data/ && babel ./ --out-dir dist/ --ignore ./node_modules,./.babelrc,./package.json,./npm-debug.log,./README.md,./LICENSE,./backstop_data,./package-lock.json --copy-files --source-maps

author: Andrew Taylor
